amendment.description: To make available from amounts available for Operation and Maintenance, Army, $4,000,000 for the Army Museum of the Southwest at Ft. Sill, Oklahoma.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1294 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1294 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Nickles. (consideration: CR S9562-9563; text: CR S9563) To make available from amounts available for Operation and Maintenance, Army, $4,000,000 for the Army Museum of the Southwest at Ft. Sill, Oklahoma.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1294 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1294 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Nickles.
